page.title: 17Employment in Brechin
page.content: We sent home some questionnaires to the pupils of primary 4 to primary 7 to find out if their mums and dads worked and what their jobs were. We found out that most people were employed and that only a few were unemployed. We also found out that the most common job was being a shop assistant. One of the questions was who is your employer and most peoples employer was Tayside Regional Council and Tayside Health Board.We found out that 75% of the people worked in Brechin and that 25% did not work in Brechin.We found that most people walk or travel by car to their work and others went by van,helicopter, company vehicle and cycle.About 90% enjoyed their work and 10% did not enjoy it because of unsocial hours and not interesting enough.
